org.opendaylight.controller.netconf.ssh.threads

Class Handshaker

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opendaylight.controller.netconf.ssh.threads.Handshaker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    @ThreadSafe
public class Handshaker
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    One instance represents per connection, responsible for ssh handshake. Once auth succeeds and correct subsystem is chosen, backend connection with netty netconf server is made. This task finishes right after negotiation is done.
